content.prompt: Which of the following changes described in both sources had the most significant political effect on late nineteenth-century Europe?

choices.label: Mass political parties became increasingly important in many European states.
Political organizations dedicated to combating imperialism began to form within many European states.
People from colonized territories began to migrate to Europe.
Political tensions increased between the European powers as imperial conflicts strained alliances.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
